items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Text-Tab-Organizer a lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly save short text inputs and browser tabs with timestamps. Easily organize your text and links in one place with options to delete your saved items. Perfect for users who want a simple, efficient way to keep track of ideas and quick thoughts without leaving the browser.
items.title: IdowuMicheal-1/Text-Tab-Organizer: Text-Tab-Organizer a lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly save short  text inputs and browser tabs with timestamps. Easily organize your text and links in one place with options to delete your saved items. Perfect for users who want a simple, efficient way to keep track of ideas and quick thoughts without leaving the browser.

items.content_html: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
items.title: Rakshan-VP/Quadcopter-sim: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
